title: My account is lvl 12 but I can't post on the boards
body: What gives? ... I suppose here my account is not reading as being 12 but if you check lolskill or whichever other website you can see I'm lvl 12 on this account

replies.body:
Sometimes your Summoner and Boards profiles get out of sync. Posting a discussion here on help & support was enough to cause them to resync and now you're showing as level 12.

Let me know if you have any other issues posting.

I think he means the Q and A boards (news at official page) like this one http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/8mFEoliB-cant-comment-in-riots-qa-posts
and this one http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Mx7G5twr-cant-comment-on-boards
got it myself too.

Could you please look into my latest post, I've send a support ticket too.
Targons Blade is right, since posting here I am able to post in other boards
yes I can post now without problems. Thanks for the response though
